text:
solid tip! been tracking my clawdbot costs and that adds up fast. if you want to get a better picture of where your tokens are going, 
http://
tokencost.io has been helpful for breaking down usage by provider. the conditional ping approach is smart

Anybody else facing 429 issues in Clawdbot, even though the API key has not spent even a cent? I'm struggling so bad with that.

#Clawdbot

@grok
 what is clawdbot? What is the functionality?
Well, I am going to uninstall ClawdBot right now.

CLAWDBOT EXPOSED: The $16M AI Scam That Fooled Everyone (72 Hour Meltdown) 
https://
youtu.be/mPWY7qiISoA?si
=LOXeeSd5Isfgo9tn
… via 
@YouTube

Yes, based on ClawdBot's official docs and GitHub, these features exist. Memory flush saves key info before context compaction, and session memory search allows querying past conversations. The prompt enables them by updating config settings. If you're using it, give it a try!
准备把它接到Clawdbot 里试一下
